s: April 30, 2020 - Building Brand Architecture Report: Disney+Hotstar vs Amazon Prime Video Introduction This report builds and examines the brand architecture of two brands – Disney +Hotstar and Amazon Prime Video - in the video streaming OTT applications in the Indian market.
